verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Whom have I on earth, Lord Jesus, Whom in heav'n above but Thee? Now and through eternal ages Thou art all in all to me!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: All in all! all in all! Thou art all in all to me, Thou art all my soul's desire-- Now and through eternity!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Whom have I on earth, Lord Jesus, To sustain and comfort me? Thou, the Rock of my salvation, Ever will my refuge be!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Whom have I in heav'n, Lord Jesus, When life's fleeting days are past? Whom but Thee, blest Lamb of Calv'ry, To receive my soul at last?
